description.en: The story is set in the year Showa 44 (1969), and it centers around Takanori Jinguuji, the 27-year-old man who eventually become the head of the Japan Shogi Association in the main 3-gatsu no Lion series.

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

title.en: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

altTitles.en: The Story of Being Taught How to Fight by a Delinquent Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 放課後はケンカ最強のギャルに連れこまれる生活　彼女たちに好かれて、僕も最強に⁉

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?

description.en:
As a result of a combination of his good-natured personality and bad luck, Shiki Orifushi ends up enrolling in St. Lukeman's Academy, a school renowned for its delinquent students.

Before entering the school, Shiki had lived a life far removed from being a delinquent, but at St. Lukeman's, he was an herbivore thrown into a predator's cage.
Shiki was well aware of his situation, but his sense of justice and good-natured personality make him catch the attention of one of the school's numerous gangs of delinquents.

For the next year, Shiki was bullied by the delinquents and lived through hellish days, but one day, he almost bumped into the school's strongest delinquent gal, Karin Kohinata, in front of a vending machine. As a result of this, Shiki's school life changes completely.

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel Raw](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330648656085875)
description.ja:
**ジャンルに「学園」がない不具合**

お人好しな性格と不運が重なった結果、折節史季（おりふし　しき）は不良校として名高い聖ルキマンツ学園に入学するハメになってしまう。

学園に入学する以前は不良とは縁遠い生活を送っていた史季は、聖ルキマンツ学園においては肉食動物の檻に放り込まれた草食動物そのもの。
史季自身もそのことは重々に承知していたが、そこそこの正義感とそこそこ以上にお人好しな性格が災いとなり、校内に掃いて捨てるほどいる不良グループの一つに目をつけられてしまう。

それから一年もの間、史季は不良グループにいじめられ、地獄のような日々を送っていたが、ある日、学園最強のヤンキーギャル――小日向夏凛（こひなた　かりん）と自販機前でぶつかりそうになったことを契機に、史季の学園生活は一変することとなる。

Garbage Hero: A Revenge Story of a Hero Who Got Summoned to Another World

altTitles.ru: Отстойный герой: Месть в ином мире

altTitles.ja: ガベージブレイブ
ガベージブレイブ 異世界に召喚され捨てられた勇者の復讐物語

description.en:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters…  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---
description.fr:
Un jour d'école normal, Tsukuru et ses camarades de classe sont transportés dans un autre monde.  
  
Ils se retrouvent… au beau milieu d’une vente aux enchères! Alors que ses camarades de classe, encore confus, sont rapidement mis aux enchères, Tsukuru découvre qu"il possède la classe "cuisinier." Aucune nation ne faisant d’offres, il est rapidement jeté dehors par une porte de transfert.  
  
De l'autre côté de cette porte se trouve un territoire dominé par de puissants monstres…  
  
Alors qu'il réussit tout juste à survivre aux attaques d’un monstre, Tsukuru décide d'avancer sur le chemin qui le rendra plus fort!

altTitles.ja: サキュバス＆ヒットマン

description.en: The "violence gun action" manga's story centers on a dual gun-wielding protagonist who makes a deal with the devil to reap the souls of sinners.
description.ja: 謎の4人組に家族もろとも殺された主人公の「俺」は、高校生「蒲生翔矢」の肉体を得、この世に再びよみがえる。復讐の女神フリアエの位階に所属する第三位上級悪魔・アルメリナと契約し、人間の魂を集めてゲヘナへと送る＜殺しの代理人＞として…。大人気デモニック・ガンアクション!!

description.en:
"The Maiden in Love Setting Off"

An original comic of the super-large science fiction project "Synduality Noir".

Ellie has feelings for her childhood friend, Kanata. Standing in Ellie's way are various women and magus surrounding Kanata... An original spin-off where you can fully experience her fluctuating emotions!

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô em um lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca em uma jornada sem fim.

The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!

altTitles.ja: トモダチゲーム

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

altTitles.ja: ネトリヴェンジ

description.en: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.

altTitles.ja: ちぇんじ123
ちぇんじひふみ

description.en: In Change 123, we meet Motoko, a girl with a very strange problem. In order to cope with her 3 adoptive fathers' incredibly intensive training methods, she developed multiple personalities, each with a different martial specialty. But what happens if none of them can beat her opponent on their own? And what further nugget of wisdom will be imparted by the great Kamen Raider?
description.pt-br: Em Change 123, encontramos Motoko, uma garota com um problema muito estranho. A fim de lidar com os métodos de treinamento intensivo incrivelmente seus três dos pais adotivos, ela desenvolveu múltiplas personalidades, cada uma com uma especialidade marcial diferente. Mas o que acontece se nenhum deles pode bater o seu adversário em seu próprio país? E o que mais pepita de sabedoria será transmitida pelo grande Kamen Raider? Este tem muitas meninas bonitas, grande arte e comédia.

altTitles.ja: シガーホリック

description.en:
The manga tells the strange tale of cigarettes in robotic human female form who expel tobacco from their kisses, much like regular cigarettes would.  
The male main character, who has never kissed anyone before, slowly adjusts his life around his new cigarette girl and newfound "addiction".

This story is about the fierce struggle between law enforcement and those who want to upset the world.  
In the Cᵗʰ century, the central bureau of the municipality, Graymark, sentence anyone to death, regardless of the severity of the offense in order to reduce the crime rate and population in proportion to the increased life expectancy due to medical advances.  
This is a conflict between the Central Bureau and the Revolutionary Army trying to overturn this system.  
  
[right]
description.fa:
⁧⁧ داستانی در مورد تقابل حکومت و کسی که می‌خواهد دنیا را واژگون کند.  
در قرن نامعلومی در شهر گری‌مارک، حکومت مرکزی برای کاهش جمعیت و جرم، قانونی تصویب کرد که صرف نظر از شدت جرم، مجرم را اعدام می‌کرد.   
داستان تقابل خیر و شر، حکومت و انقلاب، و افرادی که زیر بار حکومت نرفتن…[/right]
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde o menor delito justifica a pena de morte o plano de Burner era manter a cabeça baixa e dar o fora da Área 5. Mas depois de atingir seu limite ela de repente se vê como uma criminosa procurada em desacordo com o Bureau Central e seu administrador mais poderoso, Great. À medida que ela começa a descobrir seus próprios poderes e a ganhar novos aliados, uma guerra generalizada acontece entre o governo e a revolução. Será que uma equipa desorganizada de rebeldes será suficiente para vencer a luta para definir a justiça?

 (Fonte: Tapas) _ (Tradução: Castle Scanlator)

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

It's an exciting time in the WcDonald's Universe as the Savory Chili WcDonald's Sauce arrives! Whether it's a thrilling race or entering a portal to another world, our heroes will do whatever it takes to savor the mythical sauce to complement their WcNuggets. Follow their adventures with the limited-time sauce as a new story unfolds each week.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official English on McDonald's Canada](https://www4.mcdonalds.ca/wcdonalds/en/) (Not Region-locked)

title.en: Kyuuseishu ≪MESHIA≫~Isekai wo Sukutta Moto Yuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou Suru~

altTitles.ja: 救世主≪メシア≫～異世界を救った元勇者が魔物のあふれる現実世界を無双する～

altTitles.en: The Savior <<Messiah>> ~The Former Hero Who Saved Another World Beats the Real World Full of Monsters~

altTitles.ja-ro: Messiah: Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou suru

description.en: The "former" savior, Takeru Yamato, was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up, he finds himself in Japan, where he spent time before being summoned. However, in the city, demons appearing from "gates" rampage, and those called hunters fight using magic. Returning from another world, Takeru decides to hide his powers and live, but...
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、その強さ故に処刑された「元」救世主・大和猛。 目を覚ますとそこは、召喚される前に過ごしていた日本だった。 しかし、街では”ゲート”から現れる魔物が暴れ、ハンターと呼ばれる者たちが魔術を用いて戦っていた。 異世界帰りの猛は、力を隠して暮らす事を決めるが――…。

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

Cuộc sống của một độc giả tầm thường bỗng chuyển sang chương mới, giữa thế giới của một cuốn tiểu thuyết nọ, một cuốn tiểu thuyết mà chỉ mình anh ta biết được kết cục.

description.en:
Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

title.en: The Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

altTitles.en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle

description.en:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?

Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However, her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen, her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless, she could only watch.

Starting again from the beginning, she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun, our relation is irreconcilable, I cannot live in a world with you in it!"

Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!
description.fr:
Feng Wu, une jeune fille talentueuse, perd son sang de phénix et devient inutile après avoir été piégée par son ennemi Zuo Qingyuan. Son professeur tombe dans un profond sommeil après l'avoir sauvée. Fei Chai, une étudiante en médecine traditionnelle de l'ère moderne, entre accidentellement dans ce monde fantastique par le biais d'un jeu et prend l'identité de Feng Wu. Il s'avère que Feng Wu a conclu un accord de mariage avec Jun Linyuan, prince du clan Jun Wu. Feng Wu commence une nouvelle vie, utilisant ses connaissances modernes et ses compétences médicales pour aider sa famille, tout en passant ses journées à se cultiver. Elle se fait ainsi de nouveaux amis et tombe amoureuse de Jun Linzhou.

⋆┊Adapté du novel "Godly Empress Doctor" de Su Xiaonuan

description.en: Human genes mutate, those with extraordinary genes may gain superpowers, and those with monster genes may mutate into monsters. Xingcun, who became a monster, was awakened and later reborn after the sacrifice of the heroine. In this life, the prodigal son shall use the mutation to fight back and protect the heroine. While he may lay hidden among the supermen, and he shall secretly use his mutation to hunt monsters, seize the power of the ancient demon god, and prevent his resurrection.

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！

altTitles.zh: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级

altTitles.en: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
Rebirth Without Being the Licking King, I Use Cash to Level Up

description.en: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title.en: Okane Ariki no Kankei desu ga

altTitles.ja: お金ありきの関係ですが

description.en: Half a year ago, Yanai Makoto, a normal office employee, became his friend’s guarantor for a large loan, but in the end the friend fled and left him with enormous debt of 30 million yen. Yanai became a call boy in order to pay off the debt, until one day he stumbled across a yakuza who claimed "love at first sight" and was willing to pay 5 times his price if Yanai became his personal whore…
description.tr: Yarım yıl önce, normal bir ofis çalışanı olan Yanai Makoto, büyük bir kredi için arkadaşının kefili olur ancak sonunda arkadaşı kaçar ve ardında 30 milyon Yen gibi muazzam bir borç bırakır. Yanai, borcunu ödeyebilmek içinse fahişelik yapar… Ta ki bir gün "İlk görüşte aşk" iddiasıyla çıkagelen ve eğer Yanai kendi kişisel fahişesi olursa normal bedelinin 5 katını ödemeye istekli bir yakuzaya rastlayana kadar…

description.en: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
description.ko:
말년 휴가를 며칠 앞둔 취사병 병장 신영준에게 멸망이 찾아왔다.
삽시간에 아비규환이 되어 버린 대대, 끊어져 버린 연락망.
눈 앞에 보이는 것은 하나!
[각성을 축하드립니다!][직업 : 신입 요리사 Lv.1]
차라리 전사, 암살자 같은 직업이었다면 홀로서기라도 시도해 보았을 것을…
그에게 주어진 것은 누가 봐도 서포터 직업인 요리사...

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

description.en:
I may be a witch who is over 300 years old, but I died by the hand of the human I trusted. I thought I’d be stuck in the soul world, but I reincarnated as a princess of a Royal Palace where we kill each other. Since it became like this, in any case, I should become the Queen. “You. Be my subordinate.” I thought everyone would be afraid of me if I did this. “Can’t I touch it once? Everyone would be jealous of me because I patted your head once.” …What nonsense is this?“ Again. Do it again, since it’s cute.” But they’ve started to show me so much affection to the point that they seemed to have all gone mad as a group. …I’ll be able to become the Queen, right?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10170/)
description.ko:
나는 삼백 살이 넘는 마녀이지만, 믿었던 인간에게 배신당해 죽었다.
꼼짝없이 영혼계에 붙잡혀 있을 줄 알았는데 
서로가 서로를 죽이는 황실에 황녀로 환생했다.

이렇게 된 이상 내가 황제가 돼야겠다. 
“너. 내 부하가 대라.”

이렇게 했으니까 모두 나를 두려워하겠지, 생각했는데.

“한 번만 만져주면 안 돼? 네가 머리를 쓰다듬어줬다고 하면 모두가 부러워할 거야.”
…뭐야. 왜 이래. 

“더 해 줘. 귀여우니까.”
description.zh: 因被背叛而致死的魔女，在积蓄力量等待复活时，穿越成了以互相残杀，争夺皇位为铁律的皇室公主。 正准备惨烈地加入皇位争夺时，身边的人却反常地迷恋上我？ “太可爱了，能摸我一下吗？只要你抚摸一下我的头，所有人都会羡慕死我的。”

description.en:
What happens when a good-for-nothing human prince signs a contract with an all-powerful Demon King? Well, the prince dies instantly, and the Demon King is forced to take his place. But wait, there’s another catch! As the new Prince Lagier, the Demon King is obligated to fulfill the prince’s last wishes or never return to his former body. Join the Demon King and his demon friends as he gets in shape, battles the Angels, and races against time to complete his missions before it's too late.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)
description.fr:
Le grand Roi Démon, Embilden, a été le premier à unifier le monde des démons. Un jour, un humain a osé invoquer le Roi Démon. C’était l’avide et le gros, le Prince Lagier Lou Jerlayla Rodwill ! Cependant, en invoquant le Roi Démon, il a fait une erreur dans le processus, ce qui a causé sa mort. Le corps de Lagier est gelé de force à cause du contrat qu’il avait passé avec le Roi Démon…

« Eh bien, je pourrais tout aussi bien exaucer son souhait ». Le Roi Démon décide de devenir Lagier et d’exaucer le vœu que le Prince avait avant de mourir gelé.
Jusqu’au jour où le royaume de Jerlayla règne sur le monde avec une puissance inégalée par quiconque !
C’est le début d’une nouvelle légende…… !
« Je devrais commencer par perdre du poids ».
… Je dois d’abord faire un régime.
description.ko:
사상최초로 마계를 통일한 위대한 마왕 '엠빌던'.
제르에이라 왕국 유일의 후계자인 성격파탄자 라지에르에게 빙의되었다?!

역대 최강이라 불리는 113대 마왕 엠빌던은 어느 날 한 인간에게 소환된다.
하지만 소환자인 망나니 뚱보 왕자 '라지에르 루 제르에이라 로드윌'은 소환과 동시에 그대로 사망해 버렸고
결국 계약대행 의무에 의해 엠빌던은 라지에르의 몸에 강제로 빙의되고 마는데...


탐욕스러운 라지에르가 바란 소원은 두 가지.

첫째, 자신에게 그 누구보다 강한 힘을.
둘째, 제르에이라가 세상을 지배할 수 있도록 할 것.


마계로 돌아가기 위해 어쩔 수 없이 라지에르의 생전의 소원을 들어주기로 한 엠빌던.
라지에르가 되어 그 누구보다 강한 힘으로 제르에이라 왕국이 세상을 지배하게 되는 새로운 전설의 시작이......!


"살부터 빼야겠네."

...일단 다이어트부터 시작이다.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)
description.ru:
Как-то раз принцу Лазьеру в руки попал гримуар призыва демонических существ. Недолго думая, он воззвал к демону, прося наделить его великой силой и сделать повелителем мира. Вот только принц был слаб телом и духом, оттого не сумел выдержать мощи существа, вселившегося в него, ведь был то не простой демон, а сам 113-й король Эмбильдон, прославившийся тем, что объединил мир демонов.
Будучи контрактником, Эмбильдон не имеет права покинуть тело призывателя, пока не исполнит его желания. Но прежде чем повести «своё» королевство к мировому господству, ему придётся придумать, как поскорее разобраться с мешающим лишним весом оплывшего принца.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBj56CRxNQ0)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%9D%BC%EC%A7%80%EC%97%90%EB%A5%B4%EC%9D%98-%EC%84%9C/2507)

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

title.en: That Villain's Life, I'll Live It Once

altTitles.ko: 그 악녀 인생, 제가 한번 살아 볼게요

altTitles.en: The Villainess's Life, I'll Try Living It
I Will Live the Life of a Villainess

description.en:
On her way home, the protagonist, Jung Yuna, gets into a traffic accident.
And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!

Observing for about a week, she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death, "The Lady of the White Rose."

Not only that, but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead!
Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
With the only thing she inherited from her parents being their once-great family name, the poverty-stricken Reiko Kujouin jumped at the chance for a scholarship to attend a prestigious school known called Meisei Private Academy. Why? Because of the ¥50,000 per month allowance and all her school supplies being paid for, of course!  
  
But little could she expect that, on her very first day of classes, she would be tackled from behind by another girl who, convinced that she's been reincarnated into the world of an otome game, accuses Reiko of being a wealthy villainess…!

altTitles.ja: ロックマンエグゼ

description.en: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

description.en: The Great Collapse Era. In the near future, civilization has collapsed due to a large-scale disaster and war, and has one foot in the apocalypse. Detective Zoe, a young girl struggling to maintain security, gets caught up in mafia trouble and saves an elderly woman. But then a giant puppet weapon released by the Mafia's pursuers appears. Meanwhile, the old woman also has some kind of disturbing secret.....?
description.ja: 大崩壊時代――。大規模災害と戦争により文明は崩壊し、終末世界へ片足を進めた近未来。治安維持に奮闘する少女・ゾーイ刑事は、マフィアのトラブルに巻き込まれる形で一人の老婆を助ける。だがそこへマフィアの追っ手が放った人形巨大兵器が現れて―――。一方、老婆にも何やら物騒な秘密が……!?

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

description.en: Zhao Qi gets reborn to the warring period. At the time when the Qin emperor, Ying Zheng, started sweeping the 6 nations, and rule the world. Enlisting in the army Without hesitation, I didn’t expect once I start killing enemies I would level up the system! Slowly but surely, Zhao Qi became the commander for Da Qin’s army, when he saw emperor Qin he was immediately startled, he is actually the son of the emperor, Da Qin’s prince!
description.zh: 赵祁重生到了战国时期。正值于秦始皇嬴政开启扫六合，统天下之时。毅然入伍从军，没想到竟然开启杀敌升级系统！赵祁一步步成为了大秦锐士的统帅，当看到秦始皇后，顿时惊了，自己竟然是始皇之子，大秦长公子！

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

description.ar:
بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طردت من عائلة آرنو بسبب الترف والفساد . بعد ان تجولت في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش تم اقتيادها إلى دير رث . وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة . الشريرة التي لا تعرف الشرف . كانت هذه بيانكا . هي الحياة قبل عودة " هل هذا حقيقي ؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي ؟ " إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة . هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية ... كل هذا حقيقيا . حقا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى ... ! | سأقوم بأعمال تجارية . الزواج هو أيضا عمل . سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرا جيدا للأعمال التجارية . سيحمي أيضا . لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب الفيكونت اللعين . طفله هذا مهري " للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة . " " كم هو مهر زفافنا ؟ " " 400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة ... كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين . إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك ؟ " وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري .

---
كانت بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طُردت من عائلة أرنو بسبب الترف والفساد.
 بعد أن لم تتجول في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش ، تم اقتيادها إلى دير رثّ.
 وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة.
 الشرير الذي لا يعرف الشرف. كانت هذه هي الحياة قبل عودة بيانكا.

===
 “هل هذا حقيقي؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي؟ ”
 إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة. هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية … كل هذا كان حقيقيًا. حقًا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى …!

 سأقوم بأعمال تجارية. الزواج هو أيضا عمل.

 سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرًا جيدًا للأعمال التجارية. سيحمي طفله مهرتي أيضًا. لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب هذا الفيكونت اللعين.

 “للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة.”

 “كم هو مهر زفافنا؟”

 “400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة … كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين. ”

 “إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك؟”

 وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري.

---

description.cs:
Bianca de Arno bola bezohľadná grófka v Sevranskom kráľovstve, neslávne známa ako zlá a sebecká manželka. Zatiaľ čo jej manžel, gróf Zachar de Arno, statočne riskoval život na bojisku, ona sedela doma a míňala jeho peniaze. Až v posledný deň si Bianka uvedomila chybu svojich činov. Pred smrťou sa modlí za druhú šancu a prebudí sa vo svojom 19-ročnom tele. Vďaka druhej šanci začne Bianca vidieť všetko v novom svetle... počnúc svojím manželom.

description.en:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

description.es:
Blanca de Blanchefort. Una mujer que era la esposa de Zachary de Arno, pero que fue expulsada de la familia Arno después de su muerte por motivos de lujo, inmoralidad y lascivia. Una mujer que estuvo a punto de ser expulsada a un monasterio en la destartalada frontera tras vagar sin rumbo debido a la caída de su familia paterna, la familia Blanchefort. Y al final, una mujer que finalmente murió en el frío suelo de piedra. Una mujer sin honor. Esa era la vida antes del regreso de Bianca. *** “¿Es esto real? ¿De verdad he vuelto al pasado? “No es un sueño ni una alucinación. Esta hambre, cansancio, viveza… Todo es real.” “Dios me ha dado otra valiosa oportunidad…!” El matrimonio es un negocio después de todo. Tener un hijo de Zachary será una buena fuente de negocios. Mantendré mi dote. El maldito vizconde no se llevará el territorio de Blanchefort y el territorio de Arno. “Debo tener un hijo con mi esposo, Zachary.” “¿No debería valer la pena?” O seducirlo o persuadirlo… Esa es la cuestión.

description.fr:
Quand le Comte d'Arno meurt sur le champ de bataille, il laisse derrière lui sa femme, Bianca d'Arno. Veuve à un si jeune âge et sans héritier, elle est contrainte de vivre dans la pauvreté. Mais un jour, alors qu'elle mourait de faim, elle se réveille dans le passé. Sans aucun doute, Bianca sait ce qu'il lui reste à faire pour survivre: prendre son indépendance financière avant la mort du comte! Mais la tâche s'annonce difficile dans une société où la femme n'a pas son mot à dire...

description.id:
Bianca de Arno, istri Zachary de Arno, adalah istri jahat yang suka berfoya-foya. Setelah suaminya mati, Ia berakhir dibuang dan hidup menderita. Di ambang kematiannya, Bianca kembali ke saat ia berumur 18 tahun. Tapi sama seperti masa lalu, tidak ada seorang pun di county Arno yang menyukai dirinya. Maka itu, Bianca membutuhkan anak yang bisa menjadi penerus yang bisa mengubah posisinya yang dikucilkan. Ia pun bertekad untuk menjalankan tugasnya sebagai istri dan melahirkan penerus count Arno.

---
Bianca de Blanche, FL kita, dibuang oleh keluarga Arno setelah kematian mantan suaminya, Zakari de Arno. Karena keluarganya juga jatuh, akhirnya dia terpaksa tinggal di biara hingga akhir hidupnya. Dan seperti biasa... dia kembali ke masa lalu. Karena Bianca tidak mau mengulang hal yang sama, dia mengajukan pernikahan kontrak dengan mantan suaminya dulu. Dia berpikir, kalau dia punya anak dari Zakari, dia gak akan dibuang lagi oleh keluarga suaminya dan bisa hidup tenang. Apa kehidupan pernikahan kontrak ini akan berjalan mulus seperti yang dia harapkan?

---

description.it:
Bianca de Blanche era la moglie di Zachary de Arno, ma dopo la sua morte fu espulsa dalla famiglia Arno a causa del suo comportamento autoindulgente, frivolo e immorale. Dopo aver vagato inesorabile verso la caduta e la rovina della sua famiglia, la famiglia Blanche, viene portata in uno squallido monastero di periferia. E alla fine... morì sul freddo pavimento di pietra. Una cattiva senza onore: quella era la vita di Bianca prima di tornare indietro nel tempo.

description.ja:
贅沢な悪妻、ビアンカ・ド・アルノー。皆に捨てられて死んでいったその時、ビアンカは奇跡的に18歳に回帰する。絶縁状態にある実家、アルノー伯爵領の誰もが私のことを好きではなかった。孤立した私の立場を固めるには跡継ぎが必要… 。「私、貴方の子供を産む準備ができました」「…その話は今度にしよう」「私たちの結婚はおいくらだったでしょうか?値段相応に振舞おうと思うのです。」

description.ko:
비앙카 드 블랑쉐포르.

자카리 드 아르노의 아내였지만 그의 사후, 사치와 배덕함, 그리고 음탕함을 명분으로 아르노가(家)에서 내쳐진 여자. 친가인 블랑쉐포르가(家)의 몰락으로 오갈 데 없이 방황한 끝에 초라한 변방의 수도원으로 쫓겨나다시피 한 여자. 그리고 그 끝에 결국 차가운 돌바닥 위에서 죽게 된 여자.

명예를 모르는 악녀.

그것이 바로 비앙카의 회귀 전 생이었다.

===

“이게 현실이라고? 정말, 과거로 돌아온 거란 말이야?”

꿈도, 환각도 아니다. 이 배고픔은, 피로는, 생생함은….
이 모든 것은 현실이었다.

정말, 정말 그렇다면. 신이 나에게 다시 한 번의 값진 기회를 주신 거라면…!

‘나는 장사를 하는 거야. 결혼도 결국 장사니까. 자카리의 아이는 좋은 장사 밑천이 되어 줄 거야. 내 지참금도 지켜 주겠지. 블랑쉐포르 영지도, 아르노 영지도 그 빌어먹을 자작에게 빼앗기지 않게 될 거야.’

그러려면 그녀의 남편, 자카리의 아이를 낳아야 한다.

“우리의 결혼은 얼마짜리 결혼이었죠?”
“송아지 400마리, 돼지 900마리, 은그릇 100개, 비단 300필, 보석 두 궤짝, 그리고 영지 일부분…. 아르노가의 이 년 치 예산 만큼이었지.”
“그 값은 해야 하지 않겠어요?”

그를 유혹해서든, 설득해서든.

description.tr:
Bianca de Blanche, Zachary de Arno’nun karısıydı, ancak ölümünden sonra, keyfine düşkün, uçarı ve ahlaksız davranışları nedeniyle Arno ailesinden atıldı. Ailesi Blanche ailesinin çöküşüne ve yıkıntılarına hiçbir yere gitmedikten sonra, periferik bir manastıra sürülür. Ve sonunda, soğuk taş zeminde öldü. Şerefsiz bir hainlik: Bianca’nın zamanda geriye gitmeden önceki hayatı buydu.

前生的碧安卡身为阿尔诺伯爵的夫人，把结婚当做了一场生意的她成为了挥霍无度的恶妻，而在丈夫去世之后，身败名裂的她被家族抛弃，最终凄惨而终。一睁眼她重生回到18岁，这一世她决定要好好把握机会，为了逃避惨死的命运，她要做一个懂事的妻子，还要努力怀上阿尔诺家族的继承人…

description.pt-br:
Bianca de Blanche era a esposa de Zachary de Arno, mas após sua morte, ela foi expulsa da família Arno por luxo e imoralidade.

Depois de vagar sem propósito após a queda de seu pai e da família Blanche, ela é levada para um monastério de periferia.

E no final, ela acabou morrendo no chão de pedra fria.

Uma vilã que não conhece a honra. Essa era sua vida antes do retorno de Bianca.

===

“Isto é real? Eu voltei ao passado?”

Não é um sonho ou uma alucinação. Essa fome, fadiga, vivacidade… Tudo isso era real. Realmente, se sim, se Deus me desse mais uma oportunidade preciosa…!

‘Vou fazer negócios. O casamento também é um negócio.’

O filho de Zachary será uma boa fonte de negócios. O filho dele também protegerá meu dote. Nem a fortaleza Blanche, nem a província de Arno serão levadas por aquele maldito visconde.

‘Para fazer isso, tenho que dar à luz o filho de Zachary, meu marido da minha vida anterior.’

“Quanto é o nosso dote de casamento?”

“400 bezerros, 900 porcos, 100 tigelas de prata, 300 sedas, dois baús de joias e uma parte da propriedade… Isso era tanto quanto o orçamento de dois anos da família Arno. “

“Então, eu não deveria ter que pagar por isso?”

Quer eu o tente ou o convença, tenho que ficar com Zachary.

奢侈的惡妻，微安卡·德·阿爾諾。在被所有人拋棄並死去的時候，微安卡奇蹟般地回到了18歲。

在宛若絕緣狀態的婆家-阿爾諾伯爵領地裡誰都不喜歡自己。

要鞏固孤立的地位，就需要接班人… “我已經做好給你生孩子的準備了。”

description.en:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

[Promotional video](https://youtu.be/YmCRdVGAOPk)

[Songs accompanying the chapters.](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEbYVmn3Vy_q874VMUq41Q/video)

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

altTitles.en: The Classroom of a Black Cat and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Hắc miêu và lớp học phù thủy

altTitles.en: The Black Cat and the Witch's Classroom

altTitles.id: Ruang Kelas Kucing Hitam dan Penyihir

altTitles.vi: Lớp học của mèo đen và nàng phù thuỷ

description.en: Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of, but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly, Spica meets a mysterious, talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice, but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it, she has to kiss him on the...!?
description.ja: 『寄宿学校のジュリエット』金田陽介、最新作！「魔女見習い」スピカ・ヴァルゴは魔法が使えない。憧れの魔法学校合格のためには師匠が必要だが、金もコネもない。そんな時、人語を駆使し魔法を使う謎の黒猫がスピカの前に現れた!! 魔術を学びたいスピカと呪いを解きたい黒猫の思惑は完全一致。秘密の師弟関係が結ばれた！呪いを解く鍵は「×××」にキス!?ポンコツ魔女×黒猫先生の魔法学園ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.vi: Tác phẩm mới nhất của Kaneda Yousuke, tác giả bộ truyện “Juliet của trường nội trú”! “Phù thuỷ tập sự” Spica Virgo không thể sử dụng phép thuật. Để có thể đỗ vào ngôi trường ma pháp mà mình hằng ngưỡng mộ, Spica cần phải có một vị sư phụ dạy bảo, nhưng cô không có tiền, cũng chẳng có quan hệ. Chính vào lúc đó, một con mèo bí ẩn biết nói tiếng người và sử dụng ma pháp đột nhiên xuất hiện trước mắt cô! Spica – cô bé muốn học ma thuật và chú mèo đen muốn hoá giải lời nguyền bị ếm lên mình, cùng với ý tưởng lớn gặp nhau, giữa hai người đã hình thành mối quan hệ thầy – trò bí mật! Chìa khoá để hoá giải lời nguyền chính là một nụ hôn lên ×××!? Câu chuyện kỳ ảo về học viện ma pháp của cô phù thuỷ hậu đậu và người thầy mèo đen, chính thức bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Do mesmo autor de "Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet", Kaneda Yousuke, nova serialização! [Uma bruxa novata] Spica Virgo não consegue usar magia. Para poder entrar na academia de bruxos de seus sonhos ela precisa de um mestre de magia, mas ela não tem dinheiro nem conexões. Nessa hora, um misterioso gato preto que pode falar a lingua humana e usar magia aparece na sua frente!! Os objetivos da Spica que quer aprender magia e o gato preto que quer quebrar a maldição se coincidem. Uma relação secreta entre professor e aprendiz foi estabelecida! A chave para quebrar a maldição é beijar o [xxx]!? A história de fantasia da bruxa desajeitada x O professor gato preto na academia de magia, inicia-se!

description.en:
To revive the mixed martial arts that has been ruined due to being overshadowed by the Special Ability League, Se-Yeon calls upon Hwang Kwang-ho, a champion who was permanently banned in the past. The reason? He's the ‘God of Box Office Success’, with a talent for attracting attention. 

The distinction between ability and non-ability becomes meaningless before this man. He wields skills that have ascended to the peak level of ability, and his fighting style is cunning and unpredictable.

“However... This bastard isn’t normal either.”

Edward, a young priest, meets a veteran who's under a vicious curse. Before very long he finds himself falling in love, and makes a vow to save and protect Cliff no matter what.  
  
This is the love story of a young priest who wants to save his hero, the veteran.
description.pl: Młody ksiądz Edward spotyka weterana, który jest pod wpływem okropnej klątwy. Ze wszelkich sił stara mu się pomóc, jednak prowadzi to głównie do pojawienia się w jego sercu skomplikowanych uczuć…

description.de:
Obet Alphons hat sich mit dem Sohn des Großherzogs angelegt und wird in ein Katz- und Mausspiel verwickelt!

„Meine eigene Zukunft liegt in Trümmern, du Trottel!“

Obet nimmt als Junge verkleidet an einer kaiserlichen Veranstaltung teil, um ein Teleskop zu erhalten. Sie versucht, ihr Essen zu genießen, als sie einen unhöflichen Jungen trifft, der sie für einen Bettler hält. Obet hält sich nicht zurück und erteilt ihm eine Lektion, in dem Glauben, dass sie ihn nie wieder sehen wird. Wie es das Schicksal so will, trifft sie am nächsten Tag „den Trottel von gestern“ in ihrem Gesellschaftszimmer an! Der Junge findet heraus, dass Obet ein Mädchen ist. Sie versucht, um jeden Preis wegzulaufen. Doch der unnachgiebige Junge ist ihr dicht auf den Fersen und bedroht die Zukunft der Alphons. Was will er eigentlich? Wird Obet es schaffen, sich von diesem hartnäckigen und mächtigen Kerl zu distanzieren?

---

description.en:
Obet Alphons gets on the wrong side of the Grand Duke's son and gets tangled up in a game of cat and mouse!

"My own future is in ruins, you jerk!"

Obet attends an imperial event dressed as a boy for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude boy who mistakes her for a beggar. Obet doesn't hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she'll never see him again. As fate would have it, the next day, she finds "that jerk from yesterday" in her drawing room! The boy figures out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away, whatever it takes. But the relentless boy is hot on her tail, threatening the future of the Alphons. Just what does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent and powerful punk?

---
Obet gets on the bad side of the Grand Duke's son and falls into a chaotic, youthful romance!

"My future is in ruins, you jerk…!"

Obet attends an imperial family event dressed as a boy, for a telescope. She tries to enjoy her meal when she meets a rude jerk who asks if she’s a beggar. Obet doesn’t hold it in and teaches him a lesson, thinking she’ll never see him again…

"But why is that boy sitting in our living room?!"

The boy finds out that Obet is a girl. She wants to run away. But he keeps chasing after her. What does he want? Will Obet be able to separate herself from this persistent leech?

---
Obet has no idea what she signed up for when she attends the prince's oath ceremony disguised as her sick twin brother. Before she can make a good impression on the prince, a snooty young lord pokes fun at her, and the two of them spend the day bickering with each other. As it turns out, the lord is none other than Hinn, the son of the grand duke. To make matters worse, he instantly recognizes Obet when he visits her estate! Once he threatens to reveal what she did and bring shame to her family, she has no choice but to be nice to him. It's easy enough to avoid him at first, but this becomes harder when they start attending the same academy. Will Obet be able to keep Hinn from exposing her secret, despite the fact that he seems to be on a mission to annoy her 24/7?

---

description.fr:
Obet Alphons se met un jour à dos le fils du Grand-Duc et se retrouve embarquée dans un jeu du chat et de la souris!

«C’est mon avenir qui est ruiné, imbécile!»

La famille d’Obet la pousse à assister à un événement impérial déguisée en garçon en échange d’un télescope. Alors qu’elle tente de profiter de son repas, elle rencontre un garçon impoli qui la prend pour une mendiante. Obet ne se retient pas de lui donner une bonne leçon, pensant qu'elle ne le reverra jamais. Mais le lendemain, le destin fait qu'elle retrouve «le crétin d'hier» dans son salon! Le garçon comprend qu'Obet est une fille, et elle cherche à s’enfuir à tout prix. Mais l’impitoyable garçon est à ses trousses et menace l'avenir de la famille Alphons. Que veut-il au juste? Obet parviendra-t-elle à se défaire de cet imbécile qui est aussi tenace que puissant?

---

description.id:
Obet Alphons terpaksa menggantikan kembarannya—Ordo Alphons yang sedang sakit—untuk menghadiri upacara sumpah kesetiaan. Berkat penampilan mereka yang identik, segalanya berjalan lancar sampai Obet bertemu dengan Hinn Rehoboam, putra tunggal Duke Agung Rehoboam yang mengancam akan membongkar rahasianya. Meski Obet sudah berusaha menghindari Hinn, tapi takdir malah mempertemukan keduanya di sekolah yang sama! Apakah rahasia Obet akan tetap aman dengan kemunculan Hinn?

description.ja:
大公家の子息ヒンとオベット嬢のドタバタ青春ロマンス
“あんたさえいなけりゃ未来は明るいっての！“
高熱を出した双子兄、オルドーの代わりに皇室の儀式に男装して参加することになったオベット嬢 
それもこれも欲しかった望遠鏡を買ってくれるという母の甘い誘惑に釣られて… 
おいしいものを思う存分食べようと思っていたら隣には「お前みたいな乞食が来る場所じゃない」と 
何かとつっかかってくる嫌な奴。 
今後こんな奴とは仲良くする必要ないしと得意のサッカーゲームでギャフンと言わせてスッキリ爽快！ 
そんな翌日… 
“どうしてあいつが私の家にいるの?!”　 
あの嫌な奴が大公家の息子だっていうの？それに女ということもご法度の代理参加もバレてしまっていたなんて… 
逃げても逃げてもハイエナのようにしつこく付きまとう彼を、果たして追い払う事が出来るのだろうか！？

---

description.ko:
대공가의 아들에게 찍혀버린 오벳의 좌충우돌 청춘 로맨스! 
‘당장 내 미래가 깜깜하다, 이 자식아…!’ 

망원경에 넘어가 남장을 하고 황실 행사에 참석하게 된 오벳. 
맛있는 거나 실컷 먹으려는데 거지가 굴러 들어 왔냐며 시비를 거는 재수없는 놈을 만난다. 
어차피 한번 보고 말 사이, 오벳은 시원하게 한 방 먹이는데… 
그런데 왜 그 놈이 우리 집 응접실에 앉아 있지?! 
자신이 여자인 것을 들킨 오벳, 어떻게든 도망치고 싶다. 
그러나 거머리처럼 계속 쫓아오는 재수없는 그 놈. 도대체 목적이 뭐야? 
오벳은 과연 이 거머리처럼 끈질긴 놈을 떼어 놓는데 성공 할 수 있을까?

---

被大公家儿子盯上的奥贝横冲直撞的青春罗曼史! “臭小子,现在我的未来才是一片黯淡啊…!” 被望远镜收买女扮男装去参加皇室活动的奥贝。 本想尽情享受美食,却遇到了一个说她是乞丐各种找茬挑事的家伙。

description.es-la:
Un apacible día, se le presenta su primera prueba. En lugar del otro gemelo Ordo, que estaba enfermo, debe asistir a la reunión con el un príncipe de su edad. "¡No quiero ir! ¿Por qué tengo que fingir que soy Ordo?" "Oye, Ovette. Te compraré el telescopio que dijiste que querías tener la última vez". "Mamá, me convertiré en Ordo más perfectamente que nadie". Ovette entró en el palacio imperial con todo preparado. Y allí, se involucra con una persona extraña que ni siquiera es el príncipe. De todos modos, no voy a volver a verle, así que le apliqué la medicina correctamente... "Eres el único hijo del Archiduque Rehovem, ¿cómo te has hecho amigo de alguien así?" ¿Perdón... ...? Por alguna razón, tengo la sensación de que voy a estar terriblemente enredado con Rehovem. "Te deseo lo mejor en el futuro, el futuro de Alphonse". No, ¡espera! ¿Dónde está la amistad entre el Archiduque y el Marqués?

---

title.en: Saijaku na Boku wa "Kabenuke Bugs" de Nariagaru ~Kabe wo Surinuketara, Shokai Clear Houshuu wo Mugen Kaishuu Dekimashita!~

altTitles.ja: 最弱な僕は＜壁抜けバグ＞で成り上がる～壁をすり抜けたら、初回クリア報酬を無限回収できました！～

altTitles.en: The Evasion Skill Turns Into a “Wall Clip Bug” Under Specific Conditions! When I Clipped Through the Dungeon Wall, I Was Able To Collect An Infinite Amount of First-Time Clear Rewards and So My Stats Skyrocketed!

description.en:
In order to earn enough money for his sister, Henry set out to become an adventurer. Unfortunately, because his Disengage skill was considered useless and his stats were too low, many adventurers berated him and considered him incompetent. Even when he finally managed to join a party, he was quickly dismissed.

Out of desperation, Henry attempted a solo dive into a dungeon, and that was when he made a shocking discovery: Utilizing Disengage under specific circumstances would allow him to clip through walls.

Once he clipped through the walls, he was able to bypass the dungeon boss monster and receive the clear reward. Not only that, he was able to collect the one-time clear reward an infinite number of times!

By taking advantage of this loophole, Henry has the potential to grow at breakneck speeds!
description.ja: -壁抜けバグ-でレアアイテムゲットしまくり、ステータス爆上げしまくり！！　レアスキルで財宝とモンスター蠢く魅惑のダンジョンをガンガン踏破せよ！！　病弱な妹のためにお金を稼がなくてはいけない少年・アンリ。しかし、外れスキル-回避-しか持っていないせいで、パーティーのリーダー・ギジェルモから無能と蔑まれ荷物持ちをクビになってしまう。絶望の中、無謀にもソロでダンジョンに挑むアンリだったが、モンスターに襲われる中、-回避-スキルで壁をすり抜けられることに気が付き――！？　-回避-スキルで初回しか手に入れられないレアアイテムを無限回収し、底辺から成り上がれ！！

altTitles.ja: アデカン

description.en: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!
